name: INUIEditVoiceShortcutViewController
desc: A view controller that lets the user edit or remove an existing shortcut.

items.name: init(voiceShortcut: INVoiceShortcut)
items.desc: Creates a view controller with the shortcut to edit or remove.

items.name: var delegate: INUIEditVoiceShortcutViewControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The object that retrieves notifications from the view controller.

items.name: protocol INUIEditVoiceShortcutViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: The protocol an object implements to receive notifications from the view controller that edits or removes a shortcut in Siri.
